name: Thin Coconut Milk
description: Thin coconut milk Canned or frozen coconut milk may be used for this curry, but it will be thicker and heavier than the milk you prepare yourself.

recipeInstructions.text: To prepare thin coconut milk, cut the white coconut meat into coarse slices and combine with three cups of water in a blender or food processor. Blend until you have a fibrous liquid.
Squeeze the liquid through fine cheesecloth. Discard the pulp. Coconut milk may be kept safely for a few days in the refrigerator, or may be frozen.
